fullplot: Aspiring emcee DJay works the angles to get his first record made with help from assorted people in his Memphis 'hood. And when he hears that hip-hop superstar Skinny Black is heading to his area, he throws together a supreme hustle to grab Skinny's attention.
plot: With help from his friends, a Memphis pimp in a mid-life crisis attempts to become a successful hip-hop emcee.
title: Hustle & Flow

tomatoes.consensus: Hustle & Flow is gritty and redemptive, with a profound sense of place and exciting music.
